title: (x) Heavy condensed sans-serif - H&FJ Knockout {Jan}
content:
Hi,  
I'm sorry to post twice in the same day here in the ID board, but I can't get any results using What the font and Identifont, so...  
 [http://www.zetalab.com/ita/folio/idromusica.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025154551/http:/www.zetalab.com/ita/folio/idromusica.php "http://www.zetalab.com/ita/folio/idromusica.php")  
What is that heavy sans-serif?  
A couple of quick images:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025154551im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_1673_4036.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025154551im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_1678_5745.jpg)

I suppose it's the same font used in the titles of:  
 [http://www.uolts.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025154551/http:/www.uolts.net/ "http://www.uolts.net/")  
(where the serif one should be dolly italic)

Thank you \<3
author: Bezier Abuser
